name: Chaos Rift
description:
Agent AB-94 finds himself alone in a space station, overwhelmed by enemy aliens. Armed with state of the art plasma zappers, he may be able to fight his way through - but if he overloads the gun, the resulting explosion just might open a chaos rift, destroying anything in its path. 

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Left click to shoot or to pick up items

Hold right click to aim and release to throw your gun away from your body. 

Game, art, and music by Parsnip36.

Audio Assets:

Explosion by michalwa2003

Alarm by EminYILDIRIM

Laser by Daleonfire
